question_text: What constitutes screen failure and what are the different types you might encounter?
answer_options: Screen failure only refers to complete darkness with no other variations
Complete display loss, partial display, distortion, color problems - hardware or connection related
Screen failure exclusively indicates software corruption issues
All screen failures require operating system reinstallation
correct_answer: Complete display loss, partial display, distortion, color problems - hardware or connection related
explanation: Screen failure types: 1) Complete loss (no signal), 2) Partial display (missing sections), 3) Distortion (wavy lines, geometric problems), 4) Color problems (wrong colors, missing color channels), 5) Flickering or intermittent display. Can be caused by cable problems, graphics card failure, monitor defects, or power supply issues.
